三篇指揮法教科書 讀書心得報告Textbook Reading Papers Collection Policy (2000 words, 12 font, single space):

1\. Added benefit - paper assignment on textbook reading report not only helps you learn about conducting and music making but also greatly enhances your English skill.

2\. List you name & class ID number.

3\. Missing deadline will affect grades severely: 25% grade deduction per late day pass due date. 4. The paper will not be accepted 4 days pass the due date.

兩篇觀賞指揮音樂會評鑒報告Concert Observation Papers Guideline (2000 words, 12 font, single space):

1\. List you name & class ID number.

2\. List the date, location, performers and program.

3\. Your critique may include views on the performance, musicianship, interpretation, technical accuracy, intonation, tone color, rhythmic integrity, spirit, effectiveness of the conductor, responses from the player(s), comments on the composition, overall presentation of the musical message, etc.

4\. Apply the knowledge learned in class and express your own opinion and critical thinking.

5\. Missing deadline will affect grades severely: 25% grade deduction per late day pass due date. 6. The paper will not be accepted 4 days pass the due date.

期中考 – for mid-term exam, practice and master in conducting the exam pieces:

\* Practice/熟練 總彈 #31-45

\* Practice/熟練 Beethoven Sym. No. 1, I, to first ending

\* Practice/熟練 Stravinsky Royal March, to rehearsal 14

期末考 - for final exam, practice and master in conducting the exam pieces:

\* Practice/熟練 總彈 #46-60

\* Beethoven Sym. No. 1, I, to the end of the movement

\* Stravinsky Royal March, to rehearsal 14 to the end of the movement

課堂規則Attendance Policy: Tardiness and unexcused absences affect your final grades.

1\. Lateness: 1-point deduction on final grade.

2\. Unexcused absences: 2 points deduction on final grade.

3\. Withholding the privilege of taking the finals: 3 unexcused absences.

成績Semester grade breakdown on 1000% total

1\. Attendance and class participation: 100%

2\. Summery Reading Papers (3) on Chapters 9-16: 300%

3\. Concert Observation Papers (2): 100% x 2 = 200%

4\. Quiz 100%

5\. Mid-term: 100% (including score reading and conducting)

6\. Final: 200% (including score reading and conducting)
